Package nusri.fyp.demo.controller

Class ReviewController

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.controller.ReviewController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/review") public class ReviewController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the review-related endpoints.
This controller provides API endpoints for retrieving state machine logs, timelines, filtered timelines, and step statistics for various presets.

  • Method Details

    • getAllStateMachineLogs

      @GetMapping("/state-machine-logs") public List<StateMachineLogDto> getAllStateMachineLogs()
      Retrieves all state machine logs.
      This endpoint returns a list of all state machine logs in the system.
      The logs are returned as a list of StateMachineLogDto.
      Returns:
      A list of state machine logs in DTO format.

    • getTimeline

      @GetMapping("/state-machine-logs/{id}/timeline") @Cacheable(value="getTimeline", key="#id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<Long,PresetNodeDto>> getTimeline(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves the timeline for a given state machine log.
      This endpoint returns the timeline for the state machine log identified by its ID.
      The timeline is returned as a map where each key is a timestamp and the value is a PresetNodeDto.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the state machine log.
      Returns:
      The timeline of the state machine log as a map of timestamps to PresetNodeDto objects.

    • getFilteredTimeline

      @GetMapping("/state-machine-logs/{id}/filtered-timeline") @Cacheable(value="getFilteredTimeline", key="#id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<Long,PresetNodeDto>> getFilteredTimeline(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves the filtered timeline for a given state machine log.
      This endpoint returns a filtered version of the timeline where only the most significant nodes are kept.
      The timeline is filtered based on the duration of each node.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the state machine log.
      Returns:
      The filtered timeline of the state machine log as a map of timestamps to PresetNodeDto objects.

    • getStepStats

      @GetMapping("/step-stats/{presetName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<StepStatsDto>> getStepStats(@PathVariable String presetName)
      Retrieves statistics for steps under a specific preset.
      This endpoint calculates and returns the statistics for each step, such as average duration and standard deviation.
      Parameters:
      presetName - The name of the preset.
      Returns:
      A list of StepStatsDto containing the statistics for each step.

    • getAllStepStats

      @GetMapping("/step-stats-all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<StepStatsDto>> getAllStepStats()
      Retrieves statistics for all steps across all presets.
      This endpoint calculates and returns statistics for each step, such as average duration and standard deviation, across all available presets.
      Returns:
      A list of StepStatsDto containing the statistics for all steps.
